title: "Artificial intelligence paves the way to discovering new rare-earth compounds"
excerpt: "Artificial intelligence advances how scientists explore materials. Researchers trained a machine-learning (ML) model to assess the stability of rare-earth compounds. The framework they developed builds on current state-of-the-art methods for experimenting with compounds and understanding chemical instabilities."
